original_title: OSCARS 2023: ‘Everything Everywhere All at Once’ dominates with 7 awards
original_body_lines: Colombo (News 1st) –  'Everything Everywhere All at Once' snapped up seven major awards of the 11 categories it was nominated in, at the Academy Awards 2023 in Los Angeles on Sunday night including Best Picture, Best Actress, Best Supporting Actress and Best Supporting Actor.
All Quiet on the Western Front won four Oscars. Brendan Frazer won Best Actor for his performance in The Whale.
As expected, 'Naatu Naatu' from the Telugu hit RRR won Best Original Song.
Best Supporting Actress – Jamie Lee Curtis (Everything Everywhere All at Once)
Best Supporting Actor – Ke Huy Quan  (Everything Everywhere All at Once)
Best Animated Short Film – “The Boy, the Mole, the Fox and the Horse”
Best Directors – Daniel Kwan and Daniel Scheinert for Everything Everywhere All At Once
